item.description:
This is the Scrabble Enthusiasts of Boston's first mid-month meetup, just in time for autumn. By popular demand, same time, same location.

Recent Meetups have lasted 2-3 hours, with some folks staying for two games, and some folks leaving after just one. Turnout has ranged from 6-12. Skill and experience has ranged too, from novice players to tournament players. One thing has stayed the same, and that's everyone's fun!

A good resource for new players is the Cross Tables "cheat sheet"--a list of two letter and other highly playable words. Look it over if you like, but you don't need to to have fun playing.
item.name: October mid-month Scrabble meetup!
